word: That your mind is clouded is no evidence that Christ is not your precious Saviour. Now that the childhood of age has come upon you, He regards you as no less His child. . . . Rest in Christ's love, my sister. . . . Trust the One who has helped you in the past to hold fast to the faith.--Letter 299, Oct. 31, 1904, to "My Dear Aged Sister" (Hare).
